full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,MAH'A GSER GYI RUS SBAL GYI CHO GA LA BRTEN NAS BKRA SHIS PAR BYED PA'I GDAMS PA DGE LEGS CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @019B (CES MAH'A GSER GYI RUS SBAL GYI CHO GA LA BRTEN PA BKRA SHIS PAR BYED PA'I GDAMS PA DGE LEGS CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD 'DUN DANG LDAN PA'I DRUNG SMAN PA BLO BZANG RNAM RGYAL GYIS DNGUL GYI MAndAL GOS CHEN SER PO 'ODM GNYIS LHA RDZAS DRI MED DANG BCAS PA'I 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, BTZUN GZUGS YE SHES DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB KYIS RTZIS GZHUNG BEE DKAR LAS 'BYUNG BA LA GZHI BYA RUL SPAL GYI CHO GA ZER BA'I YI GE 'GA' ZHIG LAS LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD BLANGS TE, TSE NOR LA BSNGAGS PA'I GZA' SKAR 'PHROD PA'I NYIN PHYOGS GCIG TU BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI, NYE GNAS DGE SLONG CHOS BRTZON 'GRUS DPAL LDAN DGON GNYER DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN GNYIS KYIS BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG SEMS CAN RNAMS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: YE SHES DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB,
